thread.title: X Factor rejects hope they can shine for Gary Barlow with a second chance
thread.title_full: X Factor rejects hope they can shine for Gary Barlow with a second chance

title: X Factor rejects hope they can shine for Gary Barlow with a second chance
text:
X Factor rejects hope they can shine for Gary Barlow with a second chance X Factor rejects hope they can shine for Gary Barlow with a second chance TWO singers rejected by Simon Cowell are praying that Take That’s Gary Barlow will give them a second chance on his TV talent show Let It Shine tonight. Published 21st January 2017 
GETTY SECOND CHANCE: AJ Bentley and Kyle Passmore hope they can impress the judges 
AJ Bentley and Kyle Passmore try their luck on the BBC One stage in the hope of impressing Barlow and his fellow judges Dannii Minogue and Martin Kemp. 
But both hide their past from the panel and viewers. 
AJ, a 21-year-old dance student from London. 
GETTY STAR JUDGES: Acts try to impress Gary Barlow, Dannii Minogue and Martin Kemp The hottest X Factor babes we've ever seen Tuesday, 20th December 2016 We take a look at the hottest babes to take part in the famous X Factor. 1 / 57 
He took part in X Factor two years ago as a member of the band Ryder when they reached the Six Chair Challenge stage. 
And Kyle, a 27-year-old business analyst from Blackpool, auditioned for Britain’s Got Talent back in 2013 – but was bombed out. 
Also on the show, at 7pm, auditioning for a place in Gary Barlow’s new musical The Band is Matt Thorpe, 30, from London, who has already been in three West End shows. Related articles
